Name: Rasalhague Dominion
Description: The Rasalhague Dominion is a unique hybrid political entity that emerged in the late 31st century from the unification of Clan Ghost Bear and the Free Rasalhague Republic. Combining the rigid structure and traditions of the Clans with the democratic ideals of the Republic, the Dominion has created a balanced and innovative society. Centered around Skandia and Alshain, it maintains strong military capabilities under the tenets of Clan Ghost Bear's warrior caste, while fostering economic growth and civilian governance through the influence of its Rasalhagian citizens. The Dominion is defined by its emphasis on cooperation and unity, ensuring its people thrive within a structure that respects both cultural heritage and martial strength.
ReputationStatements: Your insistence on opposing the Dominion has been noted, Commander. However, we offer you this mission to demonstrate your ability to work alongside us rather than against us.
You have an appetite for battle, Commander. Let this contract give you a chance to channel that hunger in service to the Dominion.
We have faced you before, Commander, and you have proven your skill as a warrior. Accept this contract, and we may yet find common ground in purpose.
You are an unknown quantity to us, Commander. Prove your worth on this mission, and perhaps a fruitful relationship can begin.
Your prior service to the Dominion has been appreciated. I offer you this mission to continue building upon our established trust.
Greetings again, trusted ally of the Dominion. This mission represents the mutual respect and cooperation we have come to expect from one another.
Greetings, my brother-in-arms. You have served the Dominion so faithfully that I see you as almost one of us. I entrust you with this key mission, knowing you will not falter.
MissionSuccessStatements: Your successful completion of this mission brings great benefit to the Dominion. The agreed-upon payment has been transferred in recognition of your effort.
GoodFaithFailureStatements: Though you fell short of completing all objectives, your effort has not gone unnoticed. A partial payment will be issued, but I expect better results next time.
BadFaithFailureStatements: Your failure is unworthy of a warrior's name, Commander. You have dishonored this agreement and earned only my disappointment and scorn.
